        "answer": "option 2: Weaker user first decodes the stronger user's signal and then decodes its own signal",
        "explanation": "The order of SIC decoding in NOMA depends on the order of SNR at the receivers, or equivalently, the magnitude of the channel gains. With |h1| >= |h2|, regardless of the amount of power allocated to the users, user 1 needs to decode user 2's signal first and apply SIC to decode its own message free of interference.
